subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal ripped forehands and smacked backhands all over the court in defeating Andy Roddick, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 6-4, at the ATP World Tour Finals in London on Monday.
snippet: Rafael Nadal ripped forehands and smacked backhands all over the court in defeating Andy Roddick, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 6-4, at the ATP World Tour Finals in London on Monday.
